text: The Free Democratic Party (GDR) (, DDR) was an opposition political party in East Germany. The appeal for its formation was made on 25 November 1989 in Berlin by those East German liberals who doubted the ability of the former block party Liberal Democratic Party of Germany to reform itself. It was formally founded 4 February 1990, and 12 February 1990 it joined the Association of Free Democrats for the Volkskammer elections. ==See also== *Liberalism *Contributions to liberal theory *Liberalism worldwide *List of liberal parties *Liberal democracy *Liberalism in Germany ==External links== *Freie Demokratische Partei of the GDR from chronik der wende Category:1990 disestablishments in East Germany Category:1990 establishments in East Germany Category:Defunct liberal political parties Category:Defunct political parties in Germany Category:Peaceful Revolution Category:Organizations of the Revolutions of 1989 Category:Political parties disestablished in 1990 Category:Political parties established in 1990 Category:Political parties in East Germany
title: Free Democratic Party (GDR)
